description: LiteClaw is a lightweight OpenClaw-style project focused on delivering core autonomous AI assistant functionality with minimal overhead. LiteClaw is a community-created lightweight alternative to OpenClaw that focuses on delivering the essential functionality of an autonomous AI assistant without unnecessary complexity. It targets developers who want a clean, understandable codebase they can extend for their own use cases. Highlights: Lightweight and focused. Clean minimal codebase. Open-source. Easy to extend.
